trans-unit.source: Provides an editor that can perform default file searching for bitmap (.bmp) files.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ImageListImageEditor"></xref> class.
Edits the specified object value using the edit style provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle*> method.
This editor uses a service provider to obtain any necessary editing services.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> through which editing services can be obtained.
An <xref:System.Object> being edited.
An <xref:System.Object> representing the new value.
If the value of the object has not changed, the EditValue method returns the object that was passed to it.
Gets the description for the default file-list filter provided by this editor.
The file dialog box description appears in the file-list filter drop-down list box.
The description for the default file-list filter.
Gets an array of supported image types.
An array of <xref:System.Type> representing supported image types.
Gets a value indicating whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.PaintValue*> is implemented; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Paints a value indicated by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref>.

To display the representation of the value in the typical property sheet format, paint within the boundaries of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> contained within the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref> indicating what to paint and where to paint it.
